page.title: 04OLD PEOPLE & SPARE TIME
page.content: We went up to Somerset Court in Cheveley where many old people live We asked them what they did in their spare time. There is a community room where many of them like to play bingo and a card game called whist. They also play two other card games-beany and sevens. Some said they liked dominoes because it helped them to use their fingers. Some like to sing around the piano, and if it is hot they like to go to the pub for a drink. We do different things in our spare time-most of us watch TV, and like to play on our bikes. Most of the girls in the class have big stuffed animals to play with, and most of us like to play with our pets. Fiona likes to let out her geese over the garden because they chase her.
